name: Pink Onion
author: Christine V.
description: Total gem in this neighborhood. I was at the SF Animal Care and Control and I was responsible for dinner....so I took to Yelp and went, what? How do I not know about this place and my pie was to die for. Sold out of jalapenos, but I'll live - thank you and keep it up. Looked like a great place for a beer to Allagash White on tap....awesome.
